result.value:
PyMOL plugin is now available.  
https://github.com/yamule/SurfStamp-pymol-plugin   
Please access GitHub Page for introduction.　
https://yamule.github.io/SurfStamp-public/ 
Codes & jar are available from 
https://github.com/yamule/SurfStamp-public/releases
. 
There are some example commands in the wiki page.
https://github.com/yamule/SurfStamp-public/wiki 
Please try e_Simple3DView if you are not familiar with 3D graphics processing. (There are only 64bit Windows & Linux binaries, tho.)
https://github.com/yamule/e_Simple3DView
3dprinting, bioinformatics, biology, pdb, protein-structure, structural-bioinformatics, structural-biology, visualization

result.description:
## Important Changes
・Supports files with multiple MODELs. 

## New Options
[-nomodelname]
 Does not print the model name (id) in the texture.

[-first_model]
 Uses only the first MODEL.
result.name: v0.25

result.description:
## Important Changes
・.svg file will not be generated without the option [-save_svg].

## New Features
・gzip support for .pdb, .cif, or .sdf files.

## New Options
**If the -plain_input or -gz_input option is not specified, the file format will be determined automatically from the file name.*
[-plain_input]
 Input .pdb, .cif, or .sdf files are treated as plain ascii files.

[-gz_input]
 Input .pdb.gz, .cif.gz, or .sdf.gz files are treated as gzip-ed files.

[-save_svg]
 Outputs .svg files for texture.
result.name: v0.24

result.description:
## Bug Fix
・Fixed bug that the program does not stop when duplicate option is found.
・Fixed bug that the program can not process two adjacent comment lines in mmcif.
・Fixed bug that the program can not process TER record without chain name.
## New Options
・[-quiet (0:print all output, 1: print simple output, 2: print nothing)]
 Changes the level of output messages.
result.name: v0.23.5

result.description:
## Bug Fix  
・Fixed bug which causes infinite loops in unwrapping step

## Changes  
・Trianglate faces before unwrap  

## New option  
・[-voronoi_image_size int_value (default:2000)]  
 Change size of the image used in slice.
result.name: v0.23.3

result.description:
## Bug fix
 - Fixed bug that all residues become "gray" with "-useca" or "-usebackbone" options.
 - Fixed bug that behavior of "-usebackbone" is the same with that of "-useca".


## Changes
 - DA, DT, DG, DC, DU, DI, DN, A, G, C, U, I, and N are now considered as DNA or RNA .
 - Atoms with its alt code "A" are not removed by "-noalt" option.
 - PYL is converted to "O" in -residue_oneletter mode.
result.name: v0.23.2

result.description:
## Changes
 - Updated readme.txt (SurfStamp_src.zip is the same with the one in 0.23).

# New Options
[-asym_surface asym_ids]
 Pass comma-separated asym_ids and they will be used for surface model.


[-asym_dnarna asym_ids]
 Pass comma-separated asym_ids and they will be used for fancy nucleotide model.


[-asym_ballandstick asym_ids]
 Pass SLASH-separated asym_ids and they will be used for surface model.
 If the ids are comma-separated, the asym units will be auto-connected.
 e.g. -asym_ballandstick A,B/C 
 makes bonds between atoms in A and atoms in B (and of-course atoms in the same asym units). Bonds between "atoms in A and atoms in C" and "atoms in B and atoms in C" are not created.


[-sep_block]
 Separate faces much more frequently. This is recommended for cartoon models made by PyMOL.


[-ignore_occupancy]
 Do not darken low occupancy regions.


[-color_missing]
 Turn off the function to put gray color on residues which have missing atoms or next to the missing residues.


# Changes
 - Color for carbon atoms are set to 255,255,255

## Bug fix
 - I found several bugs in Color preset.
I sincerely sorry for inconvenience.
 - Cysteine -> Pink .
 - Exchanged colors between Chain 73 and 74.
 - Changed colors for DNA or RNA
A->Red
U,T->Green
C->Blue
G->Orange
 - Changed color for atom S (Yellow).
 - Added atom NA and FR.
 - Removed atom KA and removed atom PE.
(I think they are typos...) 

## Changes
 - Added some texts in readme.txt.
result.name: v 0.22.1

result.description:
## Bug fix
・Fixed bug in applying PDBX_STRUCT_ASSEMBLY_GEN  in mmcif.

## Changes
・To fix above bug (+ other reasons), I had to modify fundamental portion of the codes. Please let me know if you find something unexpected.

## New feature
・Added "-color_scheme 7" option which uses gradient of chain colors for background.
result.name: v 0.22

result.description:
## Bug fix
・Fixed bug that produces irregular outlines with very small faces.
result.name: v 0.21.1

result.description:
## Important change
・Outline width is automatically adjusted so as to it looks same size with any structures. (It had been quite wide with large structures so far.)
result.name: v 0.21

result.description:
## Bug fix
・Fixed bugs in superposition of letters of fancy DNA model.
・Fixed bugs showing strange error message "Scale section is null."

## New options
[-ligand_sdf .sdf(CTFile format)_file_name]
 Load sdf format file.

[-ligand_c_coloring_auto]
 Use different colors for carbons in the different chain (asym_unit) or entries in sdf.
result.name: v 0.20

result.description:
## Info
・This version asks you to explicitly set which blocks ("label" or "auth") should be used for specification when mmcif is provided.
-mmcif_use_label
-mmcif_use_auth

・Three.js scripts and loader_test.html were removed because most of the browsers don't permit the scripts to access local files.
Please try https://github.com/yamule/e_Simple3DView .

#New option
[-ligand_cylinder_radius float_value]
 Change the radius of cylinders for -ligand structure.
result.name: v 0.18

result.description:
## Bug Fix
・Fixed bug that map_ka, map_kd, and map_ks properties in mtl were always set even if a template was used.


(2019/02/27) Changed 
defaultcolor_example.dat
a bit.
result.name: v 0.17.4

result.description:
## Bug Fix
・Fixed bug that caused index out of bounds exception in EDTSurfJ.

## Changes
・Program stops when unknown options are given.
result.name: v 0.17.3

result.description:
## Bug fix
・Fixed bug that constructs faces with irregular norm in the extrusion mode.
result.name: v 0.17.1

result.description:
# Changes
・javac was changed to Corretto jdk https://aws.amazon.com/jp/corretto/

# Bug Fix
・Fixed bug that mmcif loader did not work.
・Fixed bug that buid-in surface constructor generates surface for HETATM or water atoms with -nohet or -nowater options, respectively.

# New Options
・[-mmcif_useauth] use not _label* data byt _auth* data. (The residue numbers and chain names will be the same with PDB format file.)
result.name: v 0.17

result.description:
# Important changes
・Option for built-in surface generation function [-surface_retaininside] has become default. To prevent this, please use [-surface_removeinside].

# Bug Fix
・Fixed wrong norm direction assignment on inside faces.

# Changes
・Can import material settings with -ligand_mtl_template and -mtl_template options. Please check mtl_template.dat in the example.
・Improved surface generation algorithm. I think current one is more robust but uses more memory. Please notify me if you encounter out of memory exception.
・Improved extrusion mode algorithm.  I think current one produces geometries with better quality but larger file size than before.
・You can change light setting in example HTML
result.name: v 0.16

result.description:
# Bug Fix
・Fixed infinite loop when there are size zero triangles.

# New options
[-text_object float_value(around 0.3 will be good)]
 Only polygons of texts are exported. float_value is used for thickness of the text objects.
  
[-targetpoint float_value,float_value,float_value]
 Determines directions of the texts. default is 0,Inf,0 .
  
[-scalingfactor_extrude float_value(default: 400)]
 It affects quality of -extrude or -text_object mode. Higher is better but file size becomes larger.
  
[-out_bld outputfile_prefix] 
 Very experimental option that outputs objects in colored BILD format which can be used in Chimera series. I tried but it was so heavy and the quality was not sufficient.

# New example
・how_to_chimerax in SurfStamp_with_example.zip
　With -text_object option, generated object can be used with ChimeraX. I implemented this option for VR mode~~~~ but I don't have VR system and not checked whether it can be used with VR. 
　Your report is highly appreciated!

## Running environment
Windows 10 Home Edition
java version "1.8.0_171"
Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_171-b11)
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 25.171-b11, mixed mode)


Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
java version "1.7.0_171"
OpenJDK Runtime Environment (IcedTea 2.6.13) (7u171-2.6.13-0ubuntu0.14.04.2)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 24.171-b02, mixed mode)
result.name: v 0.15.3

result.description:
# Bug Fix
・Fixed infinite loop in PDB loader
result.name: v 0.15.2

result.description:
Please use Firefox (or other browsers which can load local files (Chrome is NG)) for checking example structures.

# New features:
・Program stops if the maximum distance between atom and face is larger than 5.0 angstroms. Please use -force to cancel this function.

# New options:
[-force]
 Process your structure even if some distances between faces and atoms exceed distance limit.
 
*experimental*

[-slice]
 Slice resulting object into 2 parts. (very slow)
 _top.obj and _bottom.obj will be generated.
 
 [-sliceonly int_value(change vertex position or not. 0: no movement, 1: slight movement, 2: auto detection)]
 Stupid function to slice your object passed with -obj, -stl or -ply into 2 parts.
 example: java -jar SurfStamp.jar -sliceonly 0 -obj testin.obj -out testout.obj
  
[-usescalen] 
 Since PyMol use SCALEn(& CRYST1) lines to manage structures, I added functions to process those lines but I think the function is not enough.
 It is recommended to remove lines other than ATOM or HETATM lines before create surface model.
 

### Running environment:
Windows 10 Home Edition
java version "1.8.0_151"
Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_151-b12)
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 25.151-b12, mixed mode)

Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
java version "1.7.0_131"
OpenJDK Runtime Environment (IcedTea 2.6.9) (7u131-2.6.9-0ubuntu0.14.04.2)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 24.131-b00, mixed mode)



Source code (zip)
and
Source code (tar.gz) 
are dummy files.
result.name: version 0.15.1

result.description:
# New features:
・Can use .dx file generated by APBS (http://www.poissonboltzmann.org/ or http://nbcr-222.ucsd.edu/pdb2pqr_2.1.1/ ) for coloring.
![example](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yamule/SurfStamp-public/master/docs/img/apbs_example.png)　　

・Example files for APBS coloring is included in SurfStamp_with_example.zip

・Number of faces generated by EDTSurfJ becomes smaller than that of the previous version.


# New options:
[-color_dx .dx_file_path(expected to have been generated by APBS)]
 
 ASCII .dx http://www.ks.uiuc.edu/Research/vmd/plugins/molfile/dxplugin.html file made by apbs http://www.poissonboltzmann.org/ .
 
 
[-color_dx_dist float_value(only for -color_dx option)]
 (default: 1.4)
 Center point of the face is moved to the direction of the face's norm with the value and enegy at the point is used as the face's enegy.
  
[-face_rgb_resolution int_value(only for -color_dx option)]
 (default: 32)
 1-256 higher is better but the size of .svg file becomes big.
result.name: version 0.14

result.description:
# New features:
・Generate molecular surface model with EDTSurf (like) algorithm.

# New options:
[-surface_resolution float_value(0.1-1.0)]
 (default: 0.5)
 Set the grid size for VCMC. (angstrom level)

[-surface_retaininside]
 Make surface for inner space of the protain.
 (Defaultly, SurfStamp does not construct surface for it.)
result.name: version 0.13

result.description:
# New features:
・Face extrusion mode has become very x2 fast.
・Residues adjacent to missing or chain break regions are colored with gray.

# New options:
[-color_chainbreak]
 Do not set gray color to terminal residues.
  
[-outlinewidth_extrude float_value(only for -extrude option)]
 Set the outline width in the face extrusion mode. (angstrom level)
result.name: version 0.12

result.description:
# Bug fix:

・Fixed bug that face extrusion failed if the faces have 4 vertices.
・Fixed bug that attaching wrong  face norm with stl formatted file.


# Changes:

・Faces are triangleted if they have 4 vertices.

# New options:

[-merge_flatfaces float_value(0.0-0.2)]
Merge faces if adjacent faces have similar norms to reduce out of memory error.
(Very slow and not so effective now.)

[-stl string_value] (this option is unchecked yet!)
Load binary stl format file for surface model.

[-out_stl string_value]
Output polygon data with stl format.
This option can be used with the -extrude option.

Source code (zip)
Source code (tar.gz)
are dummy files.
result.name: version 0.11.1

result.description:
Bug Fix
・Fixed bug that background color does not appear with -texture_size_saving mode.


Source code (zip)
and
Source code (tar.gz)
are dummy files.

result.description:

result.name: version 0.10.2

result.description:
・Several bug fix.
・Fancy polynucleotide model is available with -dnarna option.
![dnarna](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yamule/SurfStamp-public/master/docs/img/sizeofncletter_1c2x_s.png)
・Changed sorting algorithm for textures.
・-ligand (and -dnarna) models can be generated without protein objects.
・New options


[-biomolecule string_value]
 Use transformed atom positions described in REMARK 350 lines.


[-smoothatom int_value]
 Atom positions are modified for very rough surface.


[-ligand_sphere_radius float_value]
 Change the size of spheres for -ligand structures.


[-texture_size_saving]
 If there are face clusters whose texture have same text and same background color, the clusters' textures are put in the same area.


[-dividemmcif string_value]
 A stupid function I made only for me to make pdb format files from pdbx/mmcif format files. The pdb files are generated in the same directry of the mmcif files with the name like <mmcif file name>_<chain name>.pdb . If there are lowercase letters, the name contains "small" before the letter. Currently, transform unit is not considered.


[-dnarna string_value]
 Generate fancy polynucleotide model.


[-dnarna_mmcif]
 Generate fancy polynucleotide model from mmcif format file.


[-dnarna_color]
 Change the ribbon color of fancy polynucleotide model.


[-areamax_ratio float_value]
 A face cluster is divided if its area is larger than this value.
 0.5-0.1 will be enough.
 
 
[-areamin_ratio float_value]
 If a face cluster's area size is smaller than this value, texts will be not shown.
 0.01 or so will be fine.

Tested environment

Windows 8.1
Oracle Java SE Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_121-b13)

Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
java version "1.7.0_101"
OpenJDK Runtime Environment (IcedTea 2.6.6) (7u101-2.6.6-0ubuntu0.14.04.1)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 24.95-b01, mixed mode)

Source code (zip)
and
Source code (tar.gz)
are dummy files.
result.name: version 0.10.1

result.description:
・Added color_scheme 5. Use occupancy value for atom coloring.
・Changed algorithm for huge objects.
・Transform operation in REMARK 350 lines can be made. (-biomolecule option) 

New options:

-usebackbone
 Only distance from backbone atoms are considered.

-large_threshold int_value
 (default: 10000)
 Change threshold to use algorithm arranged for large objects.
 Sometimes produces better result.

-exvalue_max float_value
 (default: Maximum value in the pdb file)
 The maximum value of b-factor or occupancy.

-exvalue_min float_value
 (default: Minimum value in the pdb file)
 The minimum value of b-factor or occupancy.

-exvalue_color_max string_value
 example: -exvalue_color_max 255,0,0
 (default: 255,0,0)
 The color of the faces which has the maximum b-factor or occupancy value when color scheme 4 or 5 are used.

-exvalue_color_median string_value
 (default: 255,128,128)
 The color of the faces which has the median b-factor or occupancy value when color scheme 4 or 5are used.

-exvalue_color_min string_value
 (default: 255,255,255)
 The color of the faces which has the minimum b-factor or occupancy value when color scheme 4 or 5are used.

-biomolecule string_value
 Use transformed atom position described in REMARK 350 lines.

-smoothatom int_value
 Atom positions are modified for very rough surface.

Tested environment:

Windows 8.1
Oracle Java SE Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_111-b14)
